WORK.RESEARCH.LOCATION: Chair of Information Systems II, Nuremberg
WORK.RESEARCH.DESCRIPTION_1: Research Field: Process analytics and mining, IoT Analytics
WORK.RESEARCH.DESCRIPTION_2: Investigating process mining methods for analyzing and enhancing Internet of Things (IoT) activities.
WORK.RESEARCH.DESCRIPTION_3: Applying process analytics and mining techniques to highly unstructured and knowledge-intensive processes in the domains of innovation management and case management.
WORK.RESEARCH.DESCRIPTION_4: Instructing students in advanced topics of business process management.
WORK.INBITS.DESCRIPTION_1: Architecting and developing a general-purpose cloud platform for managing innovations, business strategies, and projects.
WORK.INBITS.DESCRIPTION_2: Technologies: AngularJS, Node.js, MongoDB, Typescript, Scala, Play Framework, Apache Spark
WORK.STUDENT_DEVELOPER.LOCATION: Chair of Information Systems II, Nuremberg
WORK.STUDENT_DEVELOPER.DESCRIPTION_1: Developed an adaptive case management research prototype.
WORK.STUDENT_TUTOR.LOCATION: Chair of Information Systems II, Nuremberg
WORK.STUDENT_TUTOR.DESCRIPTION_1: Course responsibilities: Process and Information Management
WORK.STUDENT_TUTOR.DESCRIPTION_2: Tutoring students in business process management.

EDUCATION.UIBE.LOCATION: University of Business and Economics, Beijing

PROJECTS.INBITS.TEXT: INBITS Platform integrates various business solutions. It offers tools for collecting and developing ideas, trends, technologies. It provides tools for breaking down business strategies into concrete projects. It gives instruments for managing unpredictable and knowledge-intensive business processes. It provides tools for managing and enhancing personal goals. It offers a suite for connecting cyber-physical devices, and it integrates a platform for analyzing and mining of agile business processes.
PROJECTS.SYMBIO.TEXT: Symbio web is a cloud-based business process management system. With Symbio, business process architect can design and document the process architecture of their organization, process editors can model detailed BPMN and EPC processes, and process stakeholders can access released processes for reference purposes.
PROJECTS.COCAMA.TEXT: Collaborative Case Management (CoCaMa) is an adaptive case management platform for managing highly flexible and unpredictable business processes and projects. It provides collaboration tools for supporting knowledge workers in achieving their case goals.
PROJECTS.COUBR.TEXT: Coubr wants to bring gastronomy owners and guests together. Restaurant owner can offer coupons, loyalty stamps, and other stamps to their customers on a easy-to-use cloud platform. Customers can explore and use those offers on their smart phone.
PROJECTS.COUBR.SERVICE: Cloud platform and mobile app development
PROJECTS.HOMEPAGE.TEXT: sebastianhof.com is the personal homepage of Sebastian Hof. It informs you about me, my services, and my projects. Feel free to get in touch with me using the contact form.
